data.title: Great stay!
data.text: I work as a Assistant GM at the Best Western in Clinton AR. We had to come to Little Rock for a Dr appointment and decided to stay the night before to get a way as a family. They went out of their way to make sure we had connecting rooms and knew were everything was located before we left the front desk. The rooms were clean, and the pool was very refreshing. And check out was good as well! Thank you to all the staff! Job well done!

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dawn,
I am so glad that you enjoyed your stay and that you found the accommodations and service to be satisfactory.  It means so much to us to hear of the success of our staff efforts to provide a comfortable and accommodating experience. We are thrilled you enjoyed your time and found the pool refreshing.  Thank you for your kind words and we hope to be of service to you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place to stop over
data.text: We only stay at Best Westerns if we can and this was one of the best we have stayed at. The staff were professional and extremely helpful. The location was also excellent just a block off the interstate. The rooms were clean and the breakfast great.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Gaye,
We are so happy to read your positive review and thank you for being a guest here at Best Western Plus JFK Inn & Suites.  Thank you for acknowledging our staffs efforts as they work hard to cater to every guests different needs.  We are thrilled you found comfort in your room and the cleanliness was to your standards.  Please come see us again for another enjoyable experience.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Clean Hotel
data.text: Attended a retirement party for work friends and stayed at this hotel.  For the most part everything was fine.  Super friendly staff.  However, for our two night stay housekeeping did not make up the room after 2nd night.  Had to request clean towels and had to pick them up at the front desk.  Not a big deal.  Hotel is close to highway, but it was very quiet.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Mark,
We thank you for your review and happy to hear that we provided you with a welcoming atmosphere and convenient location for your work friends retirement party.  Thank you for letting us know of the lack of housekeeping service during your stay and we apologize for the inconvenience this caused.  We are using your feedback to address our cleaning policies with our staff as we hold them to higher standards.  Thank you and please come again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Did NOT meet our expectations
data.text: Carpet in hallways needed a good vacuuming (including next to the walls) and cleaning/shampooing.  Carpet in guest room needed vacuuming.  Don't stay anywhere near the elevators, especially on Friday or Saturday night.  Parties' conversations as they get off elevator are noisy!  Bed comfortable.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Janet,
We want to extend our gratitude to you for writing this review.  Happy to hear you found the bed to be comfortable, though we are sorry the carpets and area near the elevators were not up to your standards.  Thank you for bringing these matters to our attention so we may address them accordingly.  We hope to have a chance to serve you again the next time your in the area.  Thank you again and best wishes.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good over night stop
data.text:
Pleased with the accommodations and front desk was extremely polite and helpful.  The room was clean and spacious. They welcomed us as diamond members as soon as we arrived.  
There were many workers staying at the hotel with their work trucks & trailers which made parking a little cumbersome. 
I would have given this  BW 5 stars except the breakfast could use some improvement.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
texan54,
Wonderful to hear from you and learn of great and accommodating services our staff provided you. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your time here and appreciate your feedback concerning the parking situation, also for your suggestions regarding breakfast.  We are looking into our options to improve both these matters and will address them accordingly. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to be of service to you with future visits.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wild decor, adequate room, OK option in NLR
data.text: We needed to stay in North Little Rock, and we were satisfied with the Best Western.  It is listed as a "Plus" but we didn't experience anything that made it a Plus: not a "suite" and nothing special about breakfast.  The decor in the lobby and the room was wild and bizarre.  I found it amusing and entertaining, but I can see that others may find it excessive and unrestful. The front desk staff were very nice, and they seem to pride themselves on good training, which is very commendable.  Our room was clean and comfortable and one window opened, although not easily.  The view below the window was a warehouse with a lot of debris on the ground.  It was better to look straight out in the direction of Little Rock, and not look down. So try to stay on the top floor.  The breakfast was ok.  My husband has the eggs & sausage and I had cold cereal.  Coffee was ok but seemed flavored. The fitness room was clean and the bike worked well.  It was small but adequate.  The elevator was very slow and the carpet in the elevator was dirty.  Wifi worked well, as did the plumbing.  North Little Rock does not have much to offer, but if you need to stay there, this BW is a good choice.  Reasonable rate.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
X-NYr,
We are elated to read your positively detailed review thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we are happy to hear you enjoyed the decor.  Thank you for acknowledging our staffs efforts as they work hard to meet the many different needs of our guests and for sharing your feedback.  We hope to have you back for another stay soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: pets allowed
data.text: Access from the freeway (JFK exit) is very easy.  We travel with our small dog and it is often difficult to find a quality hotel which allows a dog.  Only surprise was that the second floor was designated for pets.  It would have been more convenient on the first floor.  All things considered, stay was quite comfortable.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Ellen,
We are so happy to hear from you and learn that our pet friendly policies and easy location worked well for your traveling needs.  We appreciate your review and are thrilled you had a comfortable time here.  We hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to the area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great hotel, very convenient
data.text: This hotel is in a convenient location, and is very clean. The breakfast was very good, and the breakfast lady was very nice and friendly. The pool area was clean, but the hot tub could have been a little warmer.  It was a great place to stay.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aplayez,
Wonderful to hear of how you enjoyed the value, amenities and the convenient location of our hotel!  We are glad you enjoyed every aspect from your clean room to the very good breakfast, and pool time.  We thank you for letting us know the hot tub temperature was not to your standards, we had our maintenance address this.  Thank you for your review and perfect rating we look forward to see you back soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Hotel Stay in North Little Rock
data.text: This is one of the best hotel in the Little Rock area for convenience, amenities and helpfulness, clean rooms and peaceful area.  Even though close to Interstate no noise.  You are treated with respect and courtesy.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Nina,
Our primary aim is to give you a comfortable and accommodating experience, and we are very pleased to hear of our success in this ambition.  Thank you for sharing your positive and detailed review.  We hope to have a chance to serve you again when your back this way.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Vacation
data.text: The hotel was nice. Price is too high for the area. Parking was horrible.  I  guess it would be great for a college team players and cheerleaders, but for a couple vacationing and over 60 the price was consider in the budget. However the football field for the high school is one block away.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Sophia,
Thank you for your review and comments regarding your stay, we are happy that you enjoyed your time here.  We  appreciate your suggestions and we hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Value
data.text: This hotel offers a great value to any traveler.  Full hot breakfast and comfy beds.  The decorating was a bit over the top, bright colors abound.  The outside of the hotel was being repainted while we were there, so I know they are interested in the upkeep and good appearance for guests.  Customer service was excellent.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Ruth,
It's good to hear from you and we greatly appreciate that you've taken the time to share your five star experience at our hotel! Means so much to hear of the success in our staffs efforts to provide a comfortable and accommodating experience.  Our guests opinion is very important to us, and we hope to give you another great stay the next time your traveling this way.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Slow internet
data.text: Bathroom fell well below expectations.  Location was excellent right off the I-540 interstate.  Staff was very friendly and helpful.  Hotel is polder and showing the signs of age.  The beds were comfortable and they allowed pets with a minimum deposit/charge.  I was able to make a reservation the same day as we were traveling and needed a room at the last minute.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
John, 
We strive to give you a great experience, and I am pleased to learn that we were able to meet your expectations for services, comfort and location.  Your feedback regarding the bathroom is appreciated as we use our guest reviews to improve what is lacking or needs attention.  Thank you for your time and we hope to provide you with another stay the next time your in the area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Overnight stay
data.text: This place is awful, rooms have super thin walls. There is a person running and jumping off the bed in the room above us. I have complained 4 times and it is still going on for 2 hours. Either the manager has no balls or is afraid to confront who ever is up there. After driving 12 hours and just wanting to sleep this is totally unacceptable. I don't know how this place got 3 stars in the AAA book. I'm so weak and tired I would like to go up there and kick the crap out of who ever is making the noise.I just don't want any problems here in little rock . The staff is nice but they can't handle disruptive guests obviously someone needs to give them training. There's nowhere for dogs to go to the bathroom just a small grass area. There was no manager on duty so no one could change our room. Very disappointed and tired. We had s great room the night before at the Drury inn located in Amarillo tx. No more best westerns for me😪

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
cjrocks13, 
I deeply regret to learn that you found this experience to be so terrible due to issues that should have been immediately addressed. We are continuously improving upon our services and accommodations while addressing our policies and procedures for minimizing and attending to these situations. Please accept our apologies for this disturbance and know we are working with our staff to better address these issues.  We hope that you will change your mind about giving us a second chance and that you will someday return to be impressed by the changes we've made.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great stay
data.text: We stayed here for only one night, but it was a great night.  The hotel is super clean, the room was spacious and clean.  Everyone who we came into contact with that works there was super friendly. Always with a smile and how are you?  The breakfast was yummy and the room that it was set up in was open and cheery.  We walked over to the Tropical Smoothie Cafe for dinner and it was the perfect light dinner.   The town is a quick trip by car down the interstate.  There isn't much in walking distance, but it is worth the stop!

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Tiffany,
Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and to acknowledge the efforts of our hardworking staff to be accommodating, and friendly. So great to hear you enjoyed the breakfast and our location worked for your traveling needs. Thank you again and we hope to serve you the next time your passing through.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Fun inn Little Rock
data.text: The place was very modern and clean with a great location for our activities. We really enjoyed our weekend in Little Rock. The shopping at the outlet malls was excellent along with the stay it made for a nice time. The staff was very courteous and helpful and the facility was very well kept and the fitness room and pool area were great. We'll be back for another fun outing in Little Rock.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Ben,
So wonderful to hear from you and learn we met your expectations in comfort and the amenities were to your liking.  It is our daily ambition to provide excellent services to our guests and we are thrilled to learn we met our goals during your time here.  We are glad you got out to explore the area and our location worked well for your planned activities and shopping needs.  We look forward to when you return for your next fun outing in Little Rock. Thank you and hope to see you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice hotel
data.text: The hotel décor is very pretty. My room was spacious and very clean. The bed was really comfortable. Wish my stay was longer, didn't have time to get in the indoor pool. The staff was really friendly and breakfast was good. Kudos!! Best Western

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear  700jackien,

Thank you for giving us your feedback and appreciating the hotel decor and compliment to our breakfast offered which id good. It is very rewarding to hear from you on this matter and we appreciate that you have acknowledged our efforts to provide a clean, comfortable, and hospitable experience. Two thumps up for this review and We look forward to serving you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Love this location
data.text:
I've stayed here several times. This is definitely my choice to stay at when in the Little Rock location.  They have gone the distance to make it a great experience. The staff is pleasant, friendly and easy to talk to. Thanks to Mrs Rain in the breakfast area, my morning started off with fun conversation and some laughs. 
The rooms are just awesome! From the showers to the beds. 
TO THE OWNERS: Thanks!! It's nice to have a comfortable nights rest in such nice accommodations .

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your kind comments and review regarding your most recent stay with us. I can't begin to express how much it means to our management and staff to hear from guests like yourself who have found our accommodations and services to be so welcoming and convenient throughout the years.We are all looking forward to your next visit and hope it will be just as enjoyable.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Outstanding Front Desk, Terrible Housekeeping
data.text: The front desk staff was awesome, very accommodating and willing to help. Housekeeping on the other hand was really bad. 1st room we walked in to the beds were dirty with hair on them, in the bed closest to the bathroom there were chip crumbs and stains on the mattress cover. The 2nd room was extremely dusty, a couple hairs found on the bed and an overall feeling of a not clean room.  After driving after a long day of work and changing rooms once we wanted to go to bed and not move rooms again or find a diffrereces hotel. Did I say that front desk was awesome!

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for pointing out the issues with housekeeping so that we can work to improve upon this aspect of the guest experience at our hotel. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you provided to make improvements to ensure we offer an exceptional experience for our guests in the future. We will happily share your comments with our front desk staff  and we look forward to seeing you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Last Minute Hotel
data.text: I was on an unplanned visit in Memphis Tennessee during Elvis week, OOPs Mistake lol.  All hotels were booked up.  I decided to drive back into little rock & there it was right on the interstate Best Western Plus. I stayed in a Best Western the night before & liked the stay.  This Best Western was just as nice if not just a little nicer than the one before.  The only thing I didn't like was there was no easy access restaurants close by.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your high rating of our hotel and for taking the time to share your experience! We appreciate that you have taken the time to let us know how you perceived our accommodations. We hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Decent hotel at a good price
data.text:
After reading all the reviews on Tripadvisor, my husband and I decided to try this place out. At first glance, it is very nice, however, if you look a little closer, you can see that some things need attention. 
While the young man at the front desk was outgoing and friendly, you could tell he'd recited his "spiel" many times. While giving out lots of information, it was at the expense of the other guests that were waiting. 
Once we got to our room, one of the first things that I noticed was in the bathroom for part of the cabinetry. Not sure why it would be left in that condition, but, the whole to make room for the p-trap was far from a professional finish. It's all about attention to detail.

owner_response.author: BW_Plus_JFK, Guest Relations Manager at BEST WESTERN PLUS JFK Inn & Suites, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for rating our hotel so highly! It is great to hear from you and I am so glad that you enjoyed our staff courtesy and have taken the time to recognize the hospitality and care that we aim to provide for each and every guest. We look forward to seeing you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
